name: clash of time
description:
Hi and welcome to clash of time.

The game where you build a base by your own, train soldiers from the future and from the past, and then attack other players bases and earns gold, iron, diamonds and trophies.

Try getting the as much trophies as you can but be careful, if you lose you lose trophies too.

Put the soldiers in a strategy location for them to attack as much buildings as they can.

How to play?

movement:

move with w,s,d,a or with the arrows

or with the arrows on the right,bottom of the screen

attacking:

first buy the barracks and the army camp, after that train the soldiers and press attack.

when attacking press anywhere and it will place the soldier you are on at the moment.

buying instructions:

first go to the shop and buy the gold/iron mine(you must buy one, but it's better to buy both)

after that buy whatevery you want and can.
